metadata.title: CVE-2024-36917 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  block: fix overflow in blk_ioctl_discard()  There is no check for overflow of 'start + len' in blk_ioctl_discard(). Hung task occurs if submit an discard ioctl with the following param:   start = 0x80000000000ff000, len = 0x8000000000fff000; Add the overflow validation now.
